headline: Is An Iron Curtain Closing Around America?
author: Karen Kataline
sentences: If you were a kid living in America, you couldn’t imagine how any country could stifle news and information, crush dissent or persecute dissenters simply for thinking for themselves.

Did you think you’d ever live to see the day when America would side with Communist Cuba over freedom-fighters who finally stood up
Comments:
The parallels are undeniable.
The ads appealed for help for people who were living “behind the Iron Curtain.” Here’s one of the most iconic commercials from that time.
Once upon a time in 60’s and 70’s America, public service commercials about *Radio Free Europe” filled our television airwaves.
Yet, in 2022 America we are seeing a tacit acceptance of exactly that.
It really is scary what's happening.
